4. Josh Stevenson, Council Member

Josh Stevenson, Council Member
==============================

The Honorable Josh Stevenson
----------------------------

Council Member, District #2

First Elected: November 7, 2017  
Last Elected: November 18, 2024  
Term Expires:  November 3, 2026

![QS1_7466rc](https://www.ci.sherman.tx.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=8561 "QS1_7466rc")

### CONTACT INFORMATION

1. ### Josh Stevenson

   Council Member, District #2

   Cell: 903-816-1762
